name: WinixSmartCustomSkill
0:
”Alexa, ask WINIX to turn on my purifier”
”Alexa, ask WINIX for indoor air quality”
”Alexa, ask WINIX to change fan speed to auto”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: winix
Developer Terms of Use
des:
* An integrated Winix Smart Custom Skill to control Winix Smart Air Purifiers has been released.

The Winix Smart Custom skill gives you more commands to control and monitor your Winix Smart Air purifier with Amazon Alexa using an Echo or the Alexa mobile application.
You can use the skill by selecting ‘Enable’ above and follow the guide to link your Winix Smart air purifier to Alexa.

Once connected, you can say:
“Alexa, ask WINIX to turn on my air purifier.”
“Alexa, ask WINIX for speed setting to low (or medium, high, turbo, auto, sleep mode)” 
“Alexa, ask WINIX to turn on plasmawave.” “Alexa, ask WINIX for filter status.” 
“Alexa, ask WINIX for indoor air quality.” “Alexa, ask WINIX for outdoor air quality.” 
“Alexa, ask WINIX for my air purifier model name.” 
“Alexa, ask WINIX for the phone number (or the location, or the business hours) of the customer care center.” 
“Alexa, “ask WINIX about the status of my device.”

You can refer to more commands on our website or in your manual to control or monitor your Winix Smart air purifier.
We will keep adding new utterances in the future for you to do even more with Alexa connected Winix Smart air purifiers.
